name: DesktopVRIK
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

Optional BTKUILib and AvatarMotionTweaker integrations.
changelog:
- No longer requires AvatarMotionTweaker.
- No longer piggybacks on IKSystem/PlayerSetup.

 DesktopVRIK will now handle VRIK Locomotion weight instead of relying on CVR & AMT to handle it. This means LeapMotionExtension & CVRLimbGrabber will now work properly while in crouch/prone.
